name: Crypto Volume Spike Compression Reversal
description: Intraday mean-reversion strategy for crypto assets that enters when a large volume spike coincides with a 20-period Bollinger squeeze and a reversal candlestick, seeking price snap-back toward equilibrium within 30 minutes. Risk per trade limited to 2 % equity with tight 0.5 % stops and 0.75 % targets for 1:1.5 R/R.
